ValidationRule.description: Don't allow the Active status until the associated opportunity is closed/won and the request has a project.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( LEN(pse__Opportunity__c) > 0, ISPICKVAL( pse__Status__c , 'Active'), OR( NOT( pse__Opportunity__r.IsClosed ), NOT( pse__Opportunity__r.IsWon ), LEN(pse__Project__c) = 0 ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: The Active status can only be used for closed, won opportunities and must have a project set.
